Articles.Content:
Hello Everybody,

My Name is EdFrost, i'm a Dutch student on Multimedia Design, where i have the assignment to do research about the market of Indie Games.

So, here is where i need your help with, please fill in the form to help me, and my workgroup, to pass this assignment successfully.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1iunHyNGSe6JF3qMO3iIFepLZ-Loju_8XfmK4qzQodNE/viewform?usp=send_form

I thank you all in advance, and would like to ask you to share this with everyone you know, and also give me feedback on the questions asked, so i get to know how i could make better questions.

Ed Frost.
